text: HealthVerity | Philadelphia, PA | ONSITE | Permanent | Full Stack Developer, Healthcare Data Analyst, Healthcare SQL Expert | HealthVerity is a VC-funded early-stage tech startup that offers the fastest and most efficient way to explore and acquire healthcare data. We help our clients discover, license and link patient data across the widest range of top tier data providers. We empower customers to gain new perspectives on patient activity while ensuring complete privacy management and HIPAA compliance. Our stack runs entirely on AWS and some of the tools we use are Spark, Airflow, Docker, Emberjs, and Django. Our hiring process includes: phone interviews, onsite interview, references. You can reach me with any questions at: aelefante@healthverity.com See jobs here: https://app.jobvite.com/j?cj=odUm5fwi&s=Hacker_News
